skillTree.localised_description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.

effects.description:
Oathgold from buildings: +50%
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.

effects.description: Leadership: +9

skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawiâ€™s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Gyrocopters are revolutionary flying machines that provides the armies of the Dwarfs with dedicated aerial support or as a form of fast reconnaissance.

effects.description: Mount: "Gyrocopter"

skillTree.localised_description: Gyrocopters are as valuable for reconnaissance as they are for combat, sensing the most advantageous positions from which Grimm and his army can inflict the most harm.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment (when piloting a Gyrocopter)
Speed: +12% (when piloting a Gyrocopter)

skillTree.localised_description: This new scanning device reveals enemy troop movement with greater efficiency.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25%

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This modified cannon fires Trollhammer Torpedoes - a spiky cone of death - at unfortunate foes.

effects.description:
"Trollhammer Torpedo" ammunition (when piloting a Gyrocopter)
	Projectiles cause anti-large damage

skillTree.localised_description: A Gyrobomber is a heavily-modified version of the Gyrocopter, equipped with a large payload of powerful bombs and ordinance.

effects.description: Mount: "Gyrobomber"

skillTree.localised_description: This new armoured gyrobomber plating has been developed to withstand high temperatures, as well as enemy strikes.

effects.description: Armour: +20 (when piloting a Gyrobomber)
Missile resistance: 15% (when piloting a Gyrobomber)
Speed: -5% (when piloting a Gyrobomber)

skillTree.localised_description: Enemies struck by these bombs have their flesh melted off them in a slough, leaving only scorched bones and a foul-smelling liquid that is best described as 'goo'. Even the bravest of those who survive, after seeing their comrades so gruesomely reduced, have been known to flee immediately.

effects.description:
Ability: "Napalm Bomb" (when piloting a Gyrobomber)
	(replaces: "Skyhammer Bomb")

skillTree.localised_description: This flamethower is a a powerful and deadly technological weapon that showers enemy units with a wave of white-hot alchemic fire.

effects.description:
"Flaming Shot" ammunition (when piloting a Gyrobomber)
	Projectiles cause fire damage

skillTree.localised_description: Grimm Burloksson is the youngest Dwarf to pass the many rituals required to be named a Master Engineer.

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Ballistics Calibration"
Cooldown: -30% for "Restock!"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Restock!"

skillTree.localised_description: As the son of the Guildmaster Burlok Damminsson, it was always expected that he would follow in his fatherâ€™s footsteps. Even the eldest guildmembers conceded his ability; however, there were signs that his judgement was suspect and he did not value the ancient laws that Dwarf Engineers are expected to follow.

effects.description: Hero capacity: +1 for Master Engineers

Hero recruit rank: +5 for Master Engineers
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Even as a beardling, Grimm exhibited all the signs of a skilled inventor; when other aspirants were still learning basic principles, he had already constructed a self-lighting pipe, a steam-powered beard-braider and a double-barrelled rifle that could kill a half-dozen Greenskins with one shot.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Unheeding of advice, Grimm continues to forego the precision tuning so beloved by his guild and instead focuses on the trial and error of his own bold inventions.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 for Irondrakes, Flame Cannon, Gyrocopters and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Irondrakes, Flame Cannon, Gyrocopters and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: An eccentric, if somewhat erratic genius, the young Engineer torments his guildmates by attempting new designs, questioning past methods and stubbornly refusing to give up new inventions.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -30% for Master Engineers
	(all characters)

skillTree.localised_description: Rocket Engineering was something Grimm's father started experimenting on years ago, it only makes sense his son would continue the family tradition.

effects.description: Army ability: "Grudgebuster Rocket"

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarf Engineers are known throughout the world as unparalleled masters of science, gadgets, and technology.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Weapon strength: +5%
Melee attack: +10
Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10
Armour: +15
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +20

skillTree.localised_description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

effects.description: Missile strength: +7%
Missile strength: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

effects.description: Range: +8%
Range: +15%
Ability: "Ballistics Calibration"

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

skillTree.localised_description: If you could once kill with it, this one can make it kill again, more and better.

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:

Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

factionEffects.localised_description: Zhufbar is the centre of metalwork for the Karaz Ankor and also contains the principal shrine of the Dwarf Engineer's Guild. Although it is surrounded by greenskin tribes, and its lowermost levels are riddled with Skaven, Zhufbar stands strong.
